name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Night Ops Set Bundle
summary:
Purchase the Night Ops Set bundle to blend into the night with premium gear items and weapon skins.

The Night Ops Set contains the following DLC:
- Ghillie Gear Set for Security
- Nightstalker Gear Set for Insurgents
- Midnight Blue Weapon Skin Set for Security
- Red Dark Weapon Skin Set for Insurgents

This bundle gives you access to all four Operation Nightfall DLC sets
